name: Card Fencer
description:
Journey through distant lands, collect cards to defeat your enemies, and discover other powerful treasures along the way in Card Fencer, a deck building turn-based RPG. Become the master of cards while travelling through lush forests, scorching deserts, and haunting graveyards. Be brave, stay vigilant, and conquer every challenge that stands in your way.

Be Adventurous

Brave the wilderness across distinct landscapes. Solve puzzles and defeat dangerous foes to get ahead. Be curious. Who knows what secrets you might uncover?

Remain Prepared

Collect cards as you explore the world. Build your deck with precision. Mix and match cards together to merge them into powerful techniques that can change the course of battles.

Accessorize

Discover and equip stickers throughout your journey. These unassuming artifacts hold powerful abilities within that are sure to be of great assistance on your travels.
